subject: Re: [junit] Re: Our new welcome message

messageBody:
miked wrote:

> BTW, totally off topic - whats up with your "Recipe" book? I've had it
> on order thru Amazon for over a month and they say its still about 2
> weeks out from even shipping. I need to be learning me some junit
> stuff, and pronto!

_JUnit Recipes_ is never off topic!

I described the problems at my weblog: www.diasparsoftware.com/weblog

Short version: it's coming, for real this time.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
